explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a temporal delinquent event prediction (TDEP) framework, which is a machine learning approach to predict loan defaults.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs a graph attention layer and a self-attention mechanism, which are deep learning techniques, to learn representations and integrate information.
explanations.representation learning: The paper focuses on learning representations of nodes in temporal guarantee networks, which is a key aspect of representation learning.
explanations.neural network: The proposed framework uses neural network components like graph attention layers and self-attention mechanisms.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper explicitly mentions the use of a self-attention mechanism to integrate credit behavior and network structure information.
explanations.graph attention layer: The paper employs a graph attention layer to learn the representation of nodes in temporal guarantee networks.
explanations.self-attention mechanism: The paper designs a self-attention mechanism to integrate both credit behavior and network structure information.
